alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, northeastern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Lake, or 7 miles northeast of Clearwater, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, New Port Richey, Holiday, Hudson, Palm Harbor, New Port Richey East, Beacon Square, Keystone, East Lake, Jasmine Estates, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Feather Sound, Tampa International Airport, Greater Northdale, Safety Harbor, West Park and Oldsmar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas
